channel.title: Lags in multiplayer
channel.description:
Friends, I got a few problems in multiplayer game.
1 - Lag when dead and changing into spectator mode ("spying" the alive players after being killed) 2 - Lag before respawning from prior death.
Sorry for the bad english :smiley:

item.title: Lags in multiplayer
item.dc:creator: R34L0RD
item.description:
Friends, I got a few problems in multiplayer game.

1 - Lag when dead and changing into spectator mode (“spying” the alive players after being killed)
2 - Lag before respawning from prior death.

Sorry for the bad english
